cart.name: Pac-Man
cart.description: A nanoblock set of a pac-man and cherry with approximately 150 pieces. This animal stands roughly 1.5" tall and is suitable for ages 8 and over. Each block is made with high-quality environmentally friendly material and equipped with a step-by-step guide. This is a perfect gift for anyone who loved playing pac-man during their childhood. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
